0.question: Which MCMC sampler appears to have the most consistent performance across the different variables?
0.answer: The pseudo-extended Hamiltonian Monte Carlo (HMC) sampler with fixed β = [0.25, 0.5, 0.75] appears to have the most consistent performance across the different variables. <s>

1.question: How does the performance of the PE-N=5 sampler compare to the HMC sampler?
1.ground_truth: The PE-N=5 sampler performs better than the HMC sampler.
1.answer: The PE-N=5 sampler outperforms the HMC sampler. <s>
